experience.title: Venture Partner
experience.description: Dourado Advisors is a boutique investment banking firm based in Mumbai. We cater to technology and consumer companies raising their early growth rounds.You can reach out to me on t.yadav@dourado.in
experience.description_html: Dourado Advisors is a boutique investment banking firm based in Mumbai. We cater to technology and consumer companies raising their early growth rounds.You can reach out to me on t.yadav@dourado.in <!---->

experience.title: Advisor
experience.description: Advisor to my family's business that makes Exports and Imports easy for startups and new-age businesses.For the past 20 years, our team has assisted companies across sectors, from electronics to FMCG to pharmaceuticals and chemicals and everything in between. We have worked with clients like Ninjacart, Reliance, Drools Pet Foods etc.

We have worked with clients like Ninjacart, Reliance, Drools Pet Foods etc. <!---->

experience.title: Co-Founder
experience.description: I was building reAktor, a B2B SaaS Led Marketplace for commodity chemical procurement for Chemical Manufacturers. We were able to secure multiple design partners, including some of the largest listed chemical companies in this space. But things did not work out. Lessons learnt and on to the next one.
experience.description_html: I was building reAktor, a B2B SaaS Led Marketplace for commodity chemical procurement for Chemical Manufacturers. We were able to secure multiple design partners, including some of the largest listed chemical companies in this space. But things did not work out. Lessons learnt and on to the next one. <!---->

experience.title: Investment Manager
experience.description: I built Superb Capital, an early-stage venture firm focusing on technology investments at pre-seed and seed stage from scratch as the only operations and investments member. Eventually realised that if I am going to advice and guide startups, I should have built one.Investments led for the firm:BuyEazzy (Pre-seed)Leaf Round (Pre-seed)Nector.io (Pre-seed)Siloho (Pre-seed)Daybreak (Pre-seed)LoopWorm (Seed)Mistry.Store (Seed)Simple Viral Games (Pre-seed)Teleport (Pre-seed)GreenFortune (Pre-seed)Slick (Seed)Cital (Pre-Seed)

experience.title: Associate

experience.title: Entrepreneur in Residence (Intern)
experience.description: I was fortunate enough to work under the founders during the early days of Oziva.  I learnt the importance of building an organisational culture (Oziva by far has the best culture of any org I have seen up close) from a set of gritty founders.My job was to secure strategic partnerships with nutritionists and gym trainers for the company’s product & service.

experience.title: Executive
experience.description: I was 16 when I joined and was the only employee working under the founders. Learnt a lot of lessons from the founders, mostly about how much grit and sacrifice it takes to run a startup and yet things don't work out.
